infos.value: ...It would appear that Oelde and his cubs have escaped.
How do you intend to take responsibility for this failure?
Take responsibility? And why would I do that?
Perhaps I misheard you just now...?
This is all according to plan.
...I have no ear for hollow excuses.
All it took was a little push to get Oelde and his lot to scamper from Wezette.
So now they won't have a chance to conspire with Glaciela.
We keep chasing them, exhaust their soldiers, and they will be of no help whatsoever during tomorrow morning's rebellion.
Meaning Glaciela and «Rubeus» will still strike as planned?
«Rubeus» is nothing without Leonis backing them up, wouldn't you agree?
But of course, this isn't the only trap I've set.
Let us just say that I'm looking forward to the break of dawn.
